content.raw:
## Update

For performance and ease of implementation, we're not going to bridge this message to ROS for now, and instead we'll write a plugin that directly publishes the ROS message. The sensor on `ign-sensors` will publish this message for now, but there will be no consumers (i.e. no way to visualize this message using Ignition or ROS).
content.html:
Update

For performance and ease of implementation, we're not going to bridge this message to ROS for now, and instead we'll write a plugin that directly publishes the ROS message. The sensor on ign-sensors will publish this message for now, but there will be no consumers (i.e. no way to visualize this message using Ignition or ROS).
